title: Chronic overthinker, ACG enthusiast, cringy adult.
description: I'm Lynx, a chemistry graduate looking for a job at the moment. I'm an introvert, a beyond-average ACG fan, and a Mikka Bouzu. This is simply a personal website built for fun as I'm busy being unemployed. I will upload articles to this website about almost anything from cringy night thoughts to serious Japanese grammar
